mn132:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn132:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma anando upatthanasalayam bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca bhasati.
mn132:2.2: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenupatthanasala tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
mn132:2.4: “ko nu kho, bhikkhave, upatthanasalayam bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca abhasi”ti?
mn132:2.5: “Ayasma, bhante, anando upatthanasalayam bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca abhasi”ti.
mn132:2.6: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
mn132:2.7: “yatha katham pana tvam, ananda, bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca abhasi”ti?
mn132:3.1: “Evam kho aham, bhante, bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandassesim samadapesim samuttejesim sampahamsesim, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca abhasim—
mn132:4.2: Evamrupo ahosim atitamaddhananti tattha nandim samanvaneti, evamvedano ahosim atitamaddhananti tattha nandim samanvaneti, evamsanno ahosim atitamaddhananti tattha nandim samanvaneti, evamsankharo ahosim atitamaddhananti tattha nandim samanvaneti, evamvinnano ahosim atitamaddhananti tattha nandim samanvaneti—
mn132:5.2: Evamrupo ahosim atitamaddhananti tattha nandim na samanvaneti, evamvedano ahosim atitamaddhananti tattha nandim na samanvaneti, evamsanno ahosim atitamaddhananti tattha nandim na samanvaneti, evamsankharo ahosim atitamaddhananti tattha nandim na samanvaneti, evamvinnano ahosim atitamaddhananti tattha nandim na samanvaneti—
mn132:6.2: Evamrupo siyam anagatamaddhananti tattha nandim samanvaneti, evamvedano siyam …pe…
mn132:6.5: evamvinnano siyam anagatamaddhananti tattha nandim samanvaneti—
mn132:7.2: Evamrupo siyam anagatamaddhananti tattha nandim na samanvaneti, evamvedano siyam …pe…
mn132:7.5: evamvinnano siyam anagatamaddhananti tattha nandim na samanvaneti—
mn132:8.2: Idha, avuso, assutava puthujjano ariyanam adassavi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito sappurisanam adassavi sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito
mn132:8.3: rupam attato samanupassati, rupavantam va attanam, attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam;
mn132:8.7: vinnanam attato samanupassati, vinnanavantam va attanam, attani va vinnanam, vinnanasmim va attanam—
mn132:8.8: evam kho, avuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu samhirati.
mn132:9.1: Kathanca, avuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati?
mn132:9.2: Idha, avuso, sutava ariyasavako ariyanam dassavi ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinito sappurisanam dassavi sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinito
mn132:9.3: na rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam va attanam, na attani va rupam, na rupasmim va attanam;
mn132:9.7: na vinnanam attato samanupassati, na vinnanavantam va attanam, na attani va vinnanam, na vinnanasmim va attanam—
mn132:9.8: evam kho, avuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati.
mn132:11.1: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandassesim samadapesim samuttejesim sampahamsesim, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca abhasin”ti.
mn132:11.3: Sadhu kho tvam, ananda, bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca abhasi:
mn132:13-19.10: evam kho, ananda, paccuppannesu dhammesu samhirati.
mn132:13-19.11: Kathanca, ananda, paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati …pe…
mn132:13-19.12: evam kho, ananda, paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati.
mn132:13-19.18: Attamano ayasma anando bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
